subject: Re: Website Project Request – Landing Page Optimisations (Brookvale & Belmore)

full_threads.body:
Adding time for project completion.

(Time: 1080mins)
New concern will be actioned in ticket https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/2956818914/155425

Hi Cindy,

I hope you're well!

I'm reaching out to request the rollout of the updated location landing page format to now be replicated for the following centres:



  • Brighton-Le-Sands: https://littlescribblers.com.au/location/brighton-le-sands/



  • Beaconsfield: https://littlescribblers.com.au/location/beaconsfield/



These two locations can now follow the same format as Belmore and Brookvale with updated content structure, enquiry forms, and mobile responsiveness.

Additionally, could you please:



  • Remove the "Coming Soon" label for Brighton from both the navigation menu and the location landing page banner, as the centre is now officially open.



Please let me know if you need anything further from my end to action this.

Thanks so much for your help as always!

Warm regards,
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Chelsie.

Texts on respective pages are completed.
  • https://littlescribblers.com.au/thank-you-request-callback/
  • https://littlescribblers.com.au/thank-you-book-tour/

Let me know if there's anything else we can assist you with.

Hi Cindy,

Thank you for making those updates to the landing pages - they look great.

Please keep the landing pages as they are now. It looks like there was a bit of a miscommunication around point 1 regarding the drop-down for the preferred centre. Initially my point referred to creating a new, separate form for each location page (a unique enquiry form for Belmore, another for Brookvale) to eliminate the need for a drop-down altogether on both mobile and desktop.

However as the enquiry form is shared, and will soon be rolled out across further locations, the drop-down can remain to keep the form submissions organised.

Thank-You Pages
The confirmation text on the Book Tour thank-you page is incorrect. Please update it to the following:

Thank you for your information
We will be contacting you to schedule a visit and answer your questions.

The Request Callback thank-you page text also needs correction. It should use the same text as the default thank-you page, please update it to the following:

Thanks for your enquiry
We'll get back to you as soon as we can. Our business hours are Monday to Friday 9am-5pm.

Please let me know if you need any clarification, and I'll be more than happy to help.

Kind regards,
Chelsie




Chelsie Stone
Google Ads Specialist

P: 0384188055
E: chelsie@practiceedge.com.auchelsie@practiceedge.com.au


47 Chute Street, Diamond Creek VIC 3089
practiceedge.com.au

Hello Chelsie!

Thanks for the feedback.

We have updated the pages as per request.

Please note that the reason why we have different fields on the forms is due to the initial request of having different fields in the mobile version. I have added a tag on the document.
  • Point 1: No drop down for preferred campus - these forms will be unique to the Brookvale or Belmore campuses
  • Point 2: Consider shortening the form to the following fields, to keep it concise on-page.

We have made the changes anyway so let me know if this should be reverted.

Thank you pages has been completed as well.

Here are the links:
  • https://littlescribblers.com.au/location/belmore/
  • https://littlescribblers.com.au/location/brookvale/
  • https://littlescribblers.com.au/thank-you-request-callback/
  • https://littlescribblers.com.au/thank-you-book-tour/

Hi Cindy, Thank you for your work on the landing pages, they look fantastic! I have identified an issue on the Brookvale and Belmore pages, outlined below. I've also included requirements around the 'Book a Tour' and 'Request a Callback' thank-you page creation. Enquiry Form Fields The on-page Enquiry form fields differ between desktop and mobile view (please see screenshots below). Mobile view
  • Please add a comment box (max height: 2 lines) to allow users to include their enquiry or question - currently missing
Desktop view
  • Ensure the Preferred Location dropdown is visible - currently missing
Note: Once this form is applied to the other location pages, the dropdown options will need to be updated to include the additional centres. Book a Tour Thank-you Page Please create a new thank-you page specifically for Book a Tour submissions. This page can be a duplicate of the existing thank-you page: https://littlescribblers.com.au/thank-you/ Please update the confirmation text to the following: Thank you for your information We will be contacting you to schedule a visit and answer your questions. Ensure it has a unique URL for tracking purposes, such as: /thank-you-book-tour/ Request a Callback Thank-you Page Additionally, please create a thank-you page specifically for Request a Callback submissions. This page can be a duplicate of the existing thank-you page: https://littlescribblers.com.au/thank-you/ The confirmation text can stay as is. Ensure it has a unique URL for tracking purposes, such as: /thank-you-request-callback/ If you have any questions about the above, please let me know and I'll be happy to clarify. Kind regards, Chelsie Chelsie Stone Google Ads Specialist P: 0384188055 E: chelsie@practiceedge.com.auchelsie@practiceedge.com.au 47 Chute Street, Diamond Creek VIC 3089 practiceedge.com.au

Hi Madeleine and Chelsie.

We’ve updated the section placement as requested and applied the new template for Brookvale as well.

The pages are now live and accessible!

Please feel free to let us know if there’s anything else we can assist you with.

Glad to see this project come to completion—it’s been great working with you.

Hi Madeleine and Cindy,

I hope you are both well.
Thank you for actioning those points. The landing page looks fantastic.
I'm happy for the map to stay in its current position rather than being moved to the banner. The original purpose of placing it in the banner was to improve user experience by offering a clear visual reference to the centre's location, upon landing on the page.
Instead of moving the map, could we please swap the placement of the 'Childcare in Belmore' grid images with the 'Hear from hundreds of happy parents' reviews section? Showing the reviews earlier on the page will help build trust more quickly with visitors.
Once that change is made, please feel free to go ahead and replicate the landing page updates on the Brookvale page.

Proposed layout
Review section higher on-page (as below):


Grid section lower on-page (as below):



Please let me know if you have any questions at all, and I'll be more than happy to help.

Kind regards,
Chelsie




Chelsie Stone
Google Ads Specialist

P: 0384188055
E: chelsie@practiceedge.com.auchelsie@practiceedge.com.au


47 Chute Street, Diamond Creek VIC 3089
practiceedge.com.au

Hi Cindy,

Thank you for addressing these changes and implementing the updates - the landing page is looking much more streamlined across both desktop and mobile. I really appreciate your work on this!

chelsie@practiceedge.com.au - when you have a moment, could you please confirm if the map embed location works well from your end and whether you're happy with its current placement?

We're looking forward to getting these pages live as soon as possible!

Thanks again,
Madeleine Saville
Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Chelsie.

We have completed the following items:
  • Number Anchor Link
  • Form Consistency (Desktop vs Mobile)
  • Mobile Header Adjustments - we made an adjustment on the spacing both header and banner. It may not display correctly on your end and may need to clear browser cache.

Pending items:
  • Map in Header
    We have added the map on this section. Do you want it to be displayed side by side with the green box inside the banner section?

Hi Cindy, Thank you for the recent updates - they look great. A few items still need attention: Phone Number Anchor Link
  • When clicking the phone number in the banner section (within the green box), it should scroll to the Request a Callback form, not the general enquiry form. This aligns better with user intent as the team will be calling the user back, they do not wish to submit a general enquiry in this case.
  • When clicking on the phone number in the 'Contact our Belmore Team' section (lower on page), it should scroll up to the Request a Callback form.
Form Consistency (Desktop vs Mobile)
  • The Request a Callback form changes between desktop and mobile.
  • On mobile, the date fields disappear and a comment field appears. Please ensure the mobile view matches the desktop layout.
  • The desktop version is great as is.
Mobile Header Adjustments
  • Please reduce the padding above and below the green box in the mobile header to reduce empty space,
  • Consider changing the header image for mobile, as it mostly shows a ceiling/duct.
Map in Header
  • There is no map showing in the header (which would appear on the right-hand side on desktop view, and below the green box on mobile view). Can you confirm if this is something that is still being implemented?
Thank you, Chelsie Chelsie Stone Google Ads Specialist P: 0384188055 E: chelsie@practiceedge.com.auchelsie@practiceedge.com.au 47 Chute Street, Diamond Creek VIC 3089 practiceedge.com.au

Hi Madeleine.

Just a quick update—we’ve made the template changes based on Chelsie’s feedback and applied them to the Belmore location for now.

Please feel free to let us know if there’s anything else you’d like adjusted.

Once we have your approval, we’ll be ready to set both pages live first thing in the morning!

Looking forward to your thoughts.

Hi Cindy,

Thank you for coming back to me - I hope you're feeling better soon!

I completely understand and really appreciate you taking the time to respond despite being unwell. When you're able, an update would be greatly appreciated, as we're eager to see the pages go live. These updates are key to improving our Google Ads conversions and overall campaign performance, so we're keen to get things finalised as soon as possible.

Thanks again for your support,
Madeleine Saville
Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Madeleine.

Apologies for not getting back to you yesterday.

I’ve been out of the office due to feeling unwell and haven’t been able to check in on the progress of the landing pages.

I’ll review everything and share an update with you by the end of the day.

Thank you for your understanding.

Good morning Cindy,

Just following up to check on the status of the landing page updates. Will the remaining works/changes be finalised today so we're able to take the pages live?

Looking forward to your update.

Thanks so much,
Madeleine Saville
Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

Hi Cindy

Hope you are having a great start to the week. I just wanted to touch base to see how these changes were coming along?

Thanks so much
Madeleine Saville

Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

Dolls Point NSW 2219

Hi Madeleine.

We have reverted the pages to it's original templates.

I'll let you know on Monday our progress.

Thank you.

Hi Cindy

Thank you for clarifying the timeline, yes please, if you could revert back to the previous location pages that would be great.

Kind regards
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

Hi Madeleine.

It looks like we may need a bit more time to complete these changes, so I’ve scheduled them for Monday next week.

In the meantime, would you like us to revert to the previous layout?

Thanks for this feedback, Chelsie. Greatly appreciated!

Cindy, please let us know if you need any further clarification, would love to see these tweaks finalised today if possible.

Let me know what's achievable as we may have to deactivate the pages / revert back to the old location pages if these updates can't be resolved ahead of the weekend.

Thanks so much

Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

Hi Madeleine & Cindy. It's fantastic to see the landing pages are now live! Absolutely - I have tested both pages, please see my comments below: General (Both Brookvale & Belmore Pages)
  • The "Enquire Now" button currently links to the Request a Callback form (Want to Chat About Your Child's Future?) instead of the Enquiry form (Got a Question? We're Here to Help).
    • Please update the anchor links on both pages so that:
      • On desktop:
        • the Enquire Now button in the banner section navigates to the Enquiry form.
        • the phone number click in the banner section navigates to the Request a Callback form.
      • On mobile: the sticky button navigates to the Enquiry form within the same page using an anchor link.
Belmore Page Specific
  • On desktop, clicking the phone number currently links to the Enquiry form.
    • This should instead anchor to the Request a Callback form.
Brookvale Page Specific
  • The tick icon colours in the "Stunning Facilities in Brookvale" section and below are inconsistent
    • On the Belmore page, all the tick icons are green.
    • Please ensure consistent styling by updating the tick colours on the Belmore page to match the Brookvale page (using different tick colours per section).
  • The Brookvale page is currently using the outdated review plugin.
    • Please replace it with the Trustindex plugin using the following shortcode: [trustindex data-widget-id=1b5bcb0454f357241776e283445]
Mobile View (Both Locations)
  • The above-the-fold paragraph on is still visible.
    • This was intended to be hidden on mobile to keep the Call to Actions bullet points more prominent.
  • The map section is too large and is dominating the page layout (on both desktop and mobile views)
    • Please remove the map from the banner background and replace it with an appropriate static banner image (no video).
    • Reintroduce the map as a smaller component, something similar to the example provided below (if unsure I can look for live examples). This applies to both mobile and desktop views for both locations.
Belmore Map Example: (Low resolution image, I can recreate in higher resolution for both locations if needed) Callback Request Form (Both Locations) - Want to Chat About Your Child's Future?
  • The form layout differs between desktop and mobile views.
    • Please make the desktop form layout consistent across both device views.
    • Ensure this form is as compact as possible, reduce padding where appropriate
Long Day Care & Start Strong Section (Both Locations)
  • Placeholder text is still present under key points (e.g. operating hours).
    • Please update with final copy.
Please let me know if you need any further clarification, and I'll be happy to help. Kind regards, Chelsie Chelsie Stone Google Ads Specialist P: 0384188055 E: chelsie@practiceedge.com.auchelsie@practiceedge.com.au 47 Chute Street, Diamond Creek VIC 3089 practiceedge.com.au

Hi Madeleine.

Always happy to help!

Feel free to reach out if there's anything else needed.
